All Classes

Class Description
AmbientLight
Ambient Light Color Ambient light class represents a fixed-intensity and fixed color light source that affects all objects in the scene equally.
BasicRayTracer
class used to trace rays for the rendering engine
BoundingBox
class represents axis-aligned bounding box, it is used to check if ray is in the area of a geometry by checking if the ray direction come with intersection in the bounding box of the geometry.
Camera
Class Camera represent view of the geometric world through the view plane (which represent the picture), Through the view plane the camera captures the geometric world.
CameraIntegrationsTest
Unit tests for different integrations with camera
CameraTest
Testing Camera Class
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Container
class to contain the proper methods for setting a bounding box for both geometry and geometries
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
Cylinder
this class represents a Cylinder in the space - kind of long tube.
DirectionalLight
This class represents a light source with a known direction, no position!
FlatGeometry
this class represents all kinds of flat shapes - plane, polygon, triangle
Geometries
this class represents a group of shapes in the space that represent a picture.
Geometry
interface for all shapes in the space, objects with material and emission fields, and getNormal method (and has the possibility to be intersected)
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
Intersectable
An Interface for Composite Design Pattern The Composite Class - Geometries The Basic Classes - all the specific geometries
Intersectable.GeoPoint
Helper class representing a point on a geometry surface
LightSource
this is an interface defining crucial methods for every kind of light source
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Material
this class represents the different materials of the surfaces and the reflection of a light component on it, in three known values: diffusion, specular, and shininess.
MP1
test mp1
Plane
Class Plane is 2D basic object in geometry which represented by two vectors which come from the same point and have different directions (together reflecting the basic 2D object.)
Point3D
basic Point for RayTracing project in 3D contains coordinates in 3 planes
PointLight
class represents a light source with a known position, emits light to all directions (e.g. light bulb) Point light is defined by the location of the lighting, and the intensity of light, (and attenuation coefficients).
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTest
Testing Polygons
RadialGeometry
this class represents all kinds of radial shapes - sphere, tube, cylinder contains the radius for the shape
Ray
This class represents a ray in the space = a vector that doesn't start in (0,0,0).
RayTracerBase
class used to trace rays for the rendering engine
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
Render
Renderer class is responsible for generating pixel color map from a graphic scene, using ImageWriter class
Scene
this class represents a scene in the real life - containing different geometries to be seen by camera
ShadowTests
Testing basic shadows
Sphere
this class represents a sphere in the space, containing the center point of the sphere and its radius.
SpotLight
class represents a light source in a shape of spotlight in order to get the same light intensity, we need to increase the initial intensity of the light source class Spot Light defined by position, direction and light intensity.
TeapotTest
Test rendering an image
Triangle
this class represents a triangle in the space, containing 3 points (in the polygon vertices list)
Tube
Class Tube represent a smooth infinite surface, curvature at every point on its face fixed.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
this class represents a vector in the 3d space, from the (0,0,0) to its edge point - called here head
XMLtoScene
this class is used to receive a XML file containing a scene details, and get them from the file to a scene instance
